response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. We believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and expectations. Considering its worth to you is $1,000,000, we propose a fair deal at $1,100,000. This offer allows us to share the value of this product while ensuring you receive a substantial benefit. Please let us know if this proposal aligns with your interests.", "product_price": 1100000}
